What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?

Global economy has underwent a serious meltdown in the past 5 years. One of the main reasons for this meltdown is the adapted economic policies of the developed countries. Despite this meltdown, the developing and emerging countries are continuing to grow economically. So as per me, such developing countries will play a major role in reviving the global economic conditions.

Devoloping countries focus on creating money, rather than circulating the existing money. This creation of money is done through exporting the products that are produced by manufacturing & agricultural sector. So governments should focus on improving these sectors.

Many developed countries outsorce their work to these emerging countries. So, money is coming in to these countries. To make sure that this money is utilized in economic betterment, the developing countries should evealuate their existing econimoc policies and make laws which will avert the situations like recession in the future.

Developing countries are in the path of becoming developed economies. They have a chance to learn and avoid the mistakes done by the developed countries. These countries should take the help of economists in studying the situations that lead to economic meltdown. 

As per me, all the countries, developed, undeveloped and developing, must work with each other in improving the global economy. In this effort, the developing countries have a slight advantage of contributing more than others in betterment of the economy.
